text: buy_in_limits Minimum Maximum chips buy table min_bet Minimum bet player need place every round player_buy_in Actual chips player bought bet_n_win list betting amount winning amount round. Input must like list(c(bet1,win1),c(bet2,win2),...)

title: Calculate the balance chips in hand after betting a certain rounds — poker_balance_chips
text: number indicating outstanding chips player's hand last round.

title: Calculate the balance chips in hand after betting a certain rounds — poker_balance_chips
code: buy_in_limits <- c(5000, 20000) min_bet <- 50 player_buy_in <- 10000 bet_n_win <- list(c(500, 5000), c(100, 0), c(200, 1000)) poker_balance_chips(buy_in_limits, min_bet, player_buy_in, bet_n_win) #> [1] 15200

code: pot_wins <- create_scoreboard(c(1,2,3), c(5000,3000,4000), c(200,500,300)) poker_leaderboard(pot_wins) #> # A tibble: 3 × 4 #>   player_no actual_win total_bet rounds_won #>       <dbl>      <dbl>     <dbl>      <int> #> 1         1       4800       200          1 #> 2         3       3700       300          1 #> 3         2       2500       500          1
